name: Hornby Organic Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Bar
description:
Creamy organic peanut butter, paired with gluten-free rolled oats and a thoughtful selection of seeds and nuts. Throw in some chocolate chips, a touch of honey and the malty oomph of blackstrap molasses, and you’ve got a real treat.Ingredients: rolled oats (gluten-free), peanut butter, honey, tapioca syrup, molasses, sesame seeds, chocolate chips (cane sugar, cacao mass, cacao butter), peanuts, sea salt.Allergens: peanuts and sesame, may contain traces of tree nuts.Based on beautiful Hornby Island, BC, the team at Hornby Organic follows traditional family recipes to create tasty fuel for all your outdoor pursuits.
